title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 219 - Incinerators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 219 - Incinerators

State Regulations

Subpart 219-1 - Incineration-General Provisions (§ 219-1.1 to 219-1.2)

Subpart 219-2 - Municipal and Private Solid Waste Incineration Facilities (§ 219-2.1 to 219-2.8)

Subpart 219-3 - Hospital/Medical/Infectious Waste Incineration Facilities (§ 219-3.1 to 219-3.12)

Subpart 219-4 - Human and Animal Crematories (§ 219-4.1 to 219-4.11)

Subpart 219-5 - [Repealed]
Subpart 219-6 - [Repealed]
Subpart 219-7 - Mercury Emission Limitations for Large Municipal Waste Combustors Constructed on or before September 20, 1994 (§ 219-7.1 to 219-7.2)

Subpart 219-8 - Emission Guidelines and Compliance Times for Small Municipal Waste Combustion Units Constructed on or before August 30, 1999 (§ 219-8.1 to 219-8.3)

Subpart 219-9 - EMISSION GUIDELINES AND COMPLIANCE SCHEDULES FOR EXISTING SEWAGE SLUDGE INCINERATION UNITS (§ 219-9.1 to 219-9.4)

Subpart 219-10 - Emission Guidelines and Compliance Schedules for Existing Sewage Sludge Incineration Units (§ 219-10.1 to 219-10.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 219

Amended

New

York State Register March 4, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 9, eff. 3/14/2020

Statutory Authority: Environmental Conservation Law

Sections 1-0101, 3-0301, 3-0303, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0302, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0306, 19-0311, 71-2103, 71-2105; Clean Air Act Sections
111, 129; 40 CFR Part
60, Subpart MMMM
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
